In the distance Foxfingers could see the smoke rising from the 
remains of the Predacon cave. He could hear the explosions echoeing 
all around. the scent of charred earth filled his nostrils. He 
followed the wounded group who'd caused such chaos and destruction. 
He clicked the strap on his holster to show a sign of friendship. he 
knew the risk he was taking, he hoped the slashed maximal symbol on 
his chest would be enough to convince them that he meant no harm.

He flew in slowly on his hoverboard, making sure he didn't make any 
sudden movements that would startle the group. he flew in low toward 
the bot they all seemed rallied around. "Excuse me, are you the 
leader of this group?" He'd hoped he'd found the group he'd spoken to 
during the battle, he had to be sure, "I'm Foxfingers, I heard your 
battle and came to offer my assistance with the injured." he took a 
moment to collect his thoughts. 

"They look like they could use all the help they could get." He 
thought knowing that the battle turned worse than any of them had 
imagined.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Foxfingers thought for a moment about the risk he was taking, If 
his masters
> legacy was to come true he'd have to do his part.
> 
> "I see a group of damaged bots, are you among them?" He'd have to 
first gain
> thier trust before doing his job.
> 
>
